Description:
Detects potentially suspicious changes to the SentinelOne context menu scan command by a process other than SentinelOne.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential SentinelOne Shell Context Menu Scan Command Tampering
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\shell\sentinelonescan\command\%' and  not ((process_path like '%c:\program files\sentinelone\' or process_path like '%c:\program files (x86)\sentinelone\') or ((details like 'c:\program files\sentinelone\sentinel agent%' or details like 'c:\program files (x86)\sentinelone\sentinel agent%') and details like '%\sentinelscanfromcontextmenu.exe%')))
